name: Zombie Run - Revenge of the Zombie
name_original: Zombie Run - Revenge of the Zombie
description:
- 2D-PC Action-Fighting Game -

Playing as the brain-hungry zombie-postman Frank, you have to score as many points as possible in 3 minutes. Hunt and beat up Survivors to gather these points. Only the best mailmen can make it to the top of our global highscore list and compete for the title "Best Mailman In The World".

Made by the freshman team "Survivor Productions" at the School4Games Berlin.

Homepage: zombierun.school4games.net

Release:26.02.2016

Stay hungry !
